entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. Temperature falling to 13 in the afternoon.
